title: IRON NEVER LIES: Episode 3 â€“ ALEX VARKATZAS (DEAD ICARUS, Ex-ATREYU)
author: Frank Godla
byline: By Frank Godla Published 10 hours ago
text: The third episode of our Iron Never Lies series features Alex Varkatzas of Dead Icarus and Atreyu fame, as he trains with Brandan Schieppati of Bleeding Through at his Orange County gym, Rise Above Fitness. Together they deep dive into Alex's life as a performer and beyond, the story about how he left Atreyu and his personal feelings surrounding the success of the band, how he came back with Dead Icarus and so much more as they lift, sweat and work their way to strengthening their friendship. The music for Iron Never Lies was done by Schieppati, while the series was edited by Julian Liby. Iron Never Lies was produced and filmed by Frank Godla. Want More Metal? html:
The third episode of our Iron Never Lies series features Alex Varkatzas of Dead Icarus and Atreyu fame, as he trains with Brandan Schieppati of Bleeding Through at his Orange County gym, Rise Above Fitness.

Together they deep dive into Alex's life as a performer and beyond, the story about how he left Atreyu and his personal feelings surrounding the success of the band, how he came back with Dead Icarus and so much more as they lift, sweat and work their way to strengthening their friendship.

The music for Iron Never Lies was done by Schieppati, while the series was edited by Julian Liby. Iron Never Lies was produced and filmed by Frank Godla.
